original_text: God used clay to make bodies for us who are humans. We came from the dust of the earth. We are as weak as moths. God used clay to make bodies for us who are humans.
korean_text: 하물며 흙 집에 살며 티끌로 터를 삼고 하루살이 앞에서라도 무너질 자이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: God used clay to make bodies for us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 우리를 위해 진흙으로 몸을 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: We came from the dust of the earth
We are as weak as moths
God used clay to make bodies for us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 우리를 위해 진흙으로 몸을 만드셨습니다
